techmeme.title: Amazon launches Amazon Retail Ad Service to let companies show ads in search results, product pages, and other areas of their site, initially in the US (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
Dublin-based Xocean, which provides ocean data to the energy and hydrography industries using uncrewed surface vessels, raised €115M (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
Apple says it "has never used Siri data to build marketing profiles" and never sold it for advertising or other purposes, after paying $95M to settle a lawsuit (Richard Lawler/The Verge)
Disney says it has an estimated 157M global MAUs for ad-supported content across its streaming platforms, including 112M users in the US (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
Ivanti warns that threat actors exploited a critical-rated zero-day in its widely used Connect Secure VPN tool to compromise its corporate customers' networks (Carly Page/TechCrunch)
